Name: sympathetic ophthalmia
Definition: A panuveitis that is characterized by bilateral diffuse intraocular inflammation following penetrating trauma to an eye

Name: posterior uveitis
Definition: A Chagas disease that involves deterioration of the function of the myocardium caused due to Trypanosoma cruzi infection

Name: anterior uveitis
Definition: A malaria that involves neurologic damage resulting from blockage of the blood vessels
